content:
So apparently if the server reports highlights for the same range multiple times it stacks the highlighting which has some fun side effects after https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/10067 if an (proc-)macro reuses a span a lot in its output(notice how bright the definition in the trait is compared to the one below it) :big_smile:
Code_wPaGtptCT4.png
I suppose we probably want highlight_related to only return a highlight once per range in these cases as it might be confusing for users?
oh awesome, I was just making a mental note to look into the missing highlighting in salsa dbs
Not being able to navigate from the DB functions to the implementations was getting on my nerves :big_smile:
Though I haven't gotten to the goto stuff for this yet, only highlighting to test out that the mapping is working.
Made a tracking issue for all the IDE things that need to move over to handling multiple tokens instead of the first https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10070
